foreignData.name: Vergifteter Dolch
foreignData.text: 4, {T}: Zerstöre eine Nicht-Mauerkreatur, der in diesem Zug von einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl Kampfschaden zugefügt wurde. Wenn diese zufügende Kreatur das Spiel verlässt, begrabe den Vergifteten Dolch. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, bevor die Verteidigung gewählt wurde.

name: Acidic Dagger
originalText:
o4, oc
T: Destroy any non-Wall creature receiving combat damage from target creature this turn. If targeted creature leaves play, bury Acidic Dagger. Use this ability only before defense is chosen.

rulings.text: Acidic Dagger does not affect the creature if all damage is prevented or redirected.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the Declare Blockers Step of the first combat phase in that turn.

text: {4}, {T}: Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a non-Wall creature this turn, destroy that non-Wall creature. When the targeted creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Acidic Dagger. Activate only before blockers are declared.
